scenes.visual_description: Vibrant, digital comic book art. A programmer, slumped over a keyboard, surrounded by floating lines of code. The code glows with an ominous red error message: 'Segmentation Fault'. Coffee cups litter the desk. The room is dark, illuminated only by the monitor's glow.
Close-up on the programmer's face, now determined.  The reflection of cascading green code streams across their glasses.  Energetic digital glyphs and symbols swirl around their head.

Cinematic shot of a single line of code highlighted in bright yellow amidst a vast, dark digital landscape.  Electrical sparks zap around the highlighted code, then it transforms into correct, flowing green code.

The programmer leans back, victorious, bathed in the warm glow of a successful compile. The room is brighter, the code lines are calm and blue.  A steaming mug of coffee sits untouched on the now clean desk.
